data.title: Gabriella wilde husband

data.text:
Gabriella wilde husband series#

Since 2019, Pownall has been releasing and performing under the pseudonym Alan Power. As of November 2017, their Facebook and Soundcloud pages show that Pale has been dormant since releasing an EP, The Comeback, in 2014. They worked with Jas Shaw of Simian Mobile Disco to produce their first two singles, released through the independent label 37 Adventures. Pale has supported The Vaccines and Sky Ferreira on tour. Pownall and formed the electro-pop duo Pale in late 2012, with Pownall as the singer. They parted company shortly after the release in late 2010, with Pownall taking a two and a half year break from music. Pownall's debut EP was released on 5 April 2010 through Mercury Records and his album True Love Stories was released on 25 June 2010. In one interview he claims to be "all but deaf in right ear." He later moved in with Marcus Mumford and Winston Marshall from Mumford and Sons, who he supposedly introduced to Ted Dwane. He shared a flat in London with fellow singer/songwriter Jay Jay Pistolet (who would go on to become the front man of The Vaccines). He also toured with Paloma Faith, Lissie, Marina and the Diamonds, Noah and the Whale and Florence and the Machine. As he only had a four-song set, he wrote a lot of his material whilst on tour. To his surprise, he was contacted via his MySpace profile and asked to support her on her first British tour.

He went on to study fashion design but dropped out a year later in 2006 to pursue a music career in London.Īfter meeting Adele at one of her early gigs, he told her that he was making music and she should look it up. Originally interested in fashion, he worked for French designer Roland Mouret for two years, where he was advised to study in Milan.

The son of Orlando Pownall, QC, he grew up in Richmond-upon-Thames and was educated at Windlesham House School, Marlborough College and Shiplake College. Wilde has a younger sister, Octavia, as well as five half-siblings: Olivia and Arabella Llewellyn, from her mother's first marriage, and Georgiana, Isabella, and Jacobi, from her father's first marriage, to Lady Mary-Gaye Curzon.Stephen Alan Fletcher Pownall (born 30 December 1984) is an English singer-songwriter and the husband of actress Gabriella Wilde. Her mother is a former model who sat for David Bailey and John Swannell. Her mother is the former wife of socialite Sir Dai Llewellyn, 4th Baronet. Her father was a businessman and also a former Chairman in Watermark Group. She is the daughter of John Anstruther-Gough-Calthorpe and Vanessa Hubbard. Wilde was born in Basingstoke, Hampshire of England and her nationality is English and her ethnicity is Caucasian. She is also known by her name as Anstruther Gough Calthorpe. Gabriella Wilde was born on 8 April 1989 with her birth name Gabriella Zanna Vanessa. Early Life And Education Of Gabriella Wilde

Gabriella wilde husband series#

She has enacted in numerous films and TV series including The Three Musketeers, Carrie, and Endless Love. She currently appears on the TV show Poldark alongside Aiden Turner, Eleanor Tomlinson, Ruby Bentall, and other stars. Gabriella Wilde is an English model, and actress known for her appearances in several movies and TV series.
